Wtf are ya'll talking about? This is ENGLISH, only a few moments in russian and the a/v is great. Thank you!
Of course a lot of the movie is in Russia; it fucking takes place in Moscow. There should be subtitles, though. I like being able to understand what the bad guys are saying.
the cam source is okay. however the encoding is crap. heavily pixelated . i suggest a bigger file or a 264x encoding of the source for better quality

The problem with this movie is they all want to be as tough as John McLane but Yippee-ki-январь, московское татарское студенческое собрание" is Russian for Yippee-ki-yay, motherfucker but it takes so long to say in their language McClane kills them all before they can finish the sentence.....bit unfair on the ruskies but life sux whe your a bad guy :0)
Someone could always take the audio from this and add it into the hungarian cam version which has a bit better quality.
Thank you for polish subtitles. You're the man :]
